# 3DDashboard Utils

## Introduction

This package aims to facilitate widget development by mocking the most used 3DDashboard APIs (Tagger, search, widget, etc.) AND by adding 3DDashboard util functions so development & tests can be achieved inside & outside the 3DDashboard indifferently.

## What's new in v2?

-   Full rewrite using Typescript! Enabling developers to have auto-completion & type checking,
-   [WAFData](doc/modules/WAFData.md) mocking allowing to perform HTTP request to the platform in a standalone context,
-   [i3DXCompassServices](doc/modules/i3DXCompassServices.md) mocking,
-   [_isTrusted()_](doc/modules/3DDashboard_Utils.md#istrusted) & [_requirejsPromise_](doc/modules/3DDashboard_Utils.md#requirejspromise) util functions.

## Installation

If you never installed one of the Widget Lab component, add our npm repository to your configuration:

```bash
npm config set @widget-lab:registry https://itgit.dsone.3ds.com/api/v4/packages/npm/
npm config set "//itgit.dsone.3ds.com/api/v4/packages/npm/:_authToken" "61qKzSxnrLqyeyBy1H-o"
```

Then

```bash
npm i @widget-lab/3ddashboard-utils
```

## Basic Usage

```javascript
import { widget } from "@widget-lab/3ddashboard-utils";

// now use widget in 3DDashboard context or in standalone
widget.addEvent("onLoad", () => {
    // do something
});
```

[Check the full documentation!](doc/README.md)
